segment.source: Application Virtualization Properties File System Tab
segment.target: Application Virtualization Properties File System Tab

segment.source: Application Virtualization Properties File System Tab
segment.target: Application Virtualization Properties File System Tab

segment.source: Application Virtualization Properties: File System Tab
segment.target: Application Virtualization Properties: File System Tab

segment.source: Use the File System tab of the Application Virtualization Properties dialog box to view and monitor file system settings.
segment.target: Use the File System tab of the Application Virtualization Properties dialog box to view and monitor file system settings.

segment.source: This tab contains the following elements.
segment.target: This tab contains the following elements.

segment.source: Client Cache Configuration Settings
segment.target: Client Cache Configuration Settings

segment.source: This section enables you to configure the client cache settings.
segment.target: This section enables you to configure the client cache settings.

segment.source: Click one of the following radio buttons to choose how to manage the cache space:
segment.target: Click one of the following radio buttons to choose how to manage the cache space:

segment.source: Use maximum cache size
segment.target: Use maximum cache size

segment.source: Enter a numeric value from 100 to 1,048,576 (1 TB) in the Maximum size (MB) field to specify the maximum size in MB of the cache.
segment.target: Enter a numeric value from 100 to 1,048,576 (1 TB) in the Maximum size (MB) field to specify the maximum size in MB of the cache.

segment.source: The value shown in Reserved Cache Size indicates the amount of cache in use.
segment.target: The value shown in Reserved Cache Size indicates the amount of cache in use.

segment.source: Use free disk space threshold
segment.target: Use free disk space threshold

segment.source: Enter a numeric value to specify the amount of free disk space, in MB, that the cache must leave available on the disk.
segment.target: Enter a numeric value to specify the amount of free disk space, in MB, that the cache must leave available on the disk.

segment.source: This allows the cache to grow until the amount of free disk space reaches this limit.
segment.target: This allows the cache to grow until the amount of free disk space reaches this limit.

segment.source: The value shown in Free disk space remaining indicates how much disk space is unused.
segment.target: The value shown in Free disk space remaining indicates how much disk space is unused.

segment.source: Drive Letter
segment.target: Drive Letter

segment.source: This field displays the current drive being used.
segment.target: This field displays the current drive being used.

segment.source: To change the drive, select any drive letter from the drop-down list of available drives.
segment.target: To change the drive, select any drive letter from the drop-down list of available drives.

segment.source: This setting becomes effective when the computer is rebooted.
segment.target: This setting becomes effective when the computer is rebooted.

segment.source: Related topics
segment.target: Related topics

segment.target: Client Management Console: Application Virtualization Properties
